text: @johncardillo ..does that not mean you're at risk for things like Covid-19 and should take precautions? Or you could take it from his team, 2 days ago they said he was on oxygen and getting better but his lungs needed "restrengthening". His death was preventable, that's the problem. https://t.co/cXcXSjTUGM
